data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schmidt, Stefan, Brown, Graham (2005): A new genus and species of Australian pergid sawfly (Hymenoptera: Symphyta, Pergidae) causing damage on grass (Poaceae). Zootaxa 955: 1-8, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171204
